tool_description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
title: Al-Quran

api_list.name: Get range of verses
api_list.description: Responds with a collection of *Ayahs/Verses* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{range}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get base information
api_list.description: Responds with JSON including some properties of the Quran. *(deprecated)*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get entire Surah/Chapter
api_list.description:
Possible values: ***1-114*** 
Responds with entire Surah/Chapter of the Koran including all verses in the Surah and some additional information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Represents a unique Surah/Chapter in the Koran.
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

api_list.name: Get specific Ayah/Verse
api_list.description: Responds with a specific *Ayah/Verse* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{verseid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Refers to a *Surah/Chapter* in the Koran
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

parameters.name: verseId
parameters.description: A valid *Ayah/verse* number from a specific chapter from the Quran

api_list.name: Search for a word in Quran
api_list.description: Looks for a given keyword (English) in ***translation_eng*** key in the entire Koran and responds with all the verses containing the given keyword and toal matches in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/corpus/{searchterm}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Any given keyword or phrase you like to search for in the Koran
